content.text: Let's learn how to make plans with a friend for the weekend. We'll use the informal 'tu' form and the very common word 'on' to mean 'we'.

data.tip: The 'u' sound is made by rounding your lips as if to say 'ooh' but trying to say 'ee'.

content.title: Proposing an Idea
content.setting: You are talking with your friend, Camille, about plans for the upcoming weekend.

conversation_flow.title: Suggest going to Lille
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Non, je n'ai pas de plans. Tu as une idée ?

conversation_flow.title: Suggest an activity
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Lille ? C'est une bonne idée ! Qu'est-ce qu'on peut faire là-bas ?

conversation_flow.title: React to your friend's enthusiasm
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Un musée ? Super idée ! J'aime les musées.

content.text: Great start! Now let's discuss the details, like transportation and time.

data.phrase: On se retrouve à neuf heures

data.tip: This is a nasal sound. Try to say 'tran' while letting air escape through your nose.

content.title: Discussing Logistics
content.setting: You've decided on the city and activity. Now you need to figure out the logistics.

conversation_flow.title: Suggest a time to meet
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: D'accord pour le train. On se retrouve quand ?

conversation_flow.title: Check if they agree with the plan
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Samedi matin à neuf heures, c'est parfait pour moi.

conversation_flow.title: Acknowledge their agreement
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oui, ça me va très bien !

content.text: Excellent! The plan is almost ready. Let's confirm everything and show some excitement.

data.tip: The 'r' sound is made in the back of your throat, like a light gargle.
The 'h' at the beginning of 'hâte' is silent. It sounds like 'aht'.

content.title: Finalizing the Plan
content.setting: You're both happy with the plan. It's time to confirm the final details.

conversation_flow.title: Confirm the meeting point
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Oui, c'est ça. On se retrouve où ?

conversation_flow.title: Express excitement
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: D'accord. Samedi, neuf heures, à la gare.

conversation_flow.title: Say goodbye
conversation_flow.chatbot_message: Moi aussi ! Ça va être super ! À samedi !
